A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Dont believe the critic's reviews\, this movie isnt the 'best Starwars movie since Empire'. In fact its not even a good Starwars movie. The move has a huge amount of plot holes and the fact it completely disregards and throws away many of the things built up in TFW. Not only this but destroys and misrepresents the characters from the original trilogy. Luke Skywalkers representation in this movie was not only disappointing and out of character but flat out disrespectful to fans of Starwars.
